TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TransactionInterop extends System.Object
public ref class TransactionInterop abstract sealed

summary.span: 加強 與元件之間的互動，這些元件是在先前所寫入，以便與 MSDTC、COM+ 或 互動。

span.span: Facilitates interaction between and components that were previously written to interact with MSDTC, COM+, or .
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供交易傳播方法。This class provides methods for transaction propagation. 如需有關此程序的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 交易傳播](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/b09541e6-4baf-4e37-b879-62884fbb0969.asp)。For more information on how this process works, see [Transaction Propagation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/b09541e6-4baf-4e37-b879-62884fbb0969.asp). 使用這個類別所提供的方法，您可以參與的交易傳播，匯出/匯入 （push 模式） 和傳送者/接收者 （提取模型） 的兩種類型。Using the methods provided by this class, you can engage in two types of transaction propagations, Export/Import (push model) and Transmitter/Receiver (pull model). 匯出/匯入 （push 模式） 傳播牽涉到以下步驟中，The Export/Import (push model) propagation involves these steps, 1. 在遠端電腦，取得"whereabouts 」 該機器之交易管理員藉由呼叫方法。On the remote machine, obtain the "whereabouts" of the transaction manager of that machine by calling the method. 您可以接著快取這項資訊供未來使用的用戶端電腦上。You can then cache this piece of information on the client machine for future usage. 2. 傳送包含用戶端電腦使用任何慣用的方法之所在位置的資料。Send the data containing the whereabouts to the client machine using any preferred method 3. 用戶端電腦上，使用交易 「 匯出 」 到遠端電腦，並產生交易"cookie"之所在位置。On the client machine, use the whereabouts to "export" the transaction to the remote machine and generate a transaction "cookie". 這是藉由呼叫並傳入遠端電腦的所在資訊。This is done by calling and passing in the remote machine's whereabouts. 4. 包含交易資料"cookie"傳送到遠端電腦使用任何慣用的方法Send the data containing the transaction "cookie" to the remote machine using any preferred method 5. 遠端電腦上，使用"cookie"交易來取得用戶端交易的複製品，藉由呼叫方法。On the remote machine, use the transaction "cookie" to obtain a clone of the client transaction by calling the method. 6. 遠端電腦上，使用複製交易登記使用 resource manager或是方法類別。On the remote machine, use the clone transaction to enlist the resource manager using the or methods of the class. 傳送者/接收者 （提取模型） 傳播牽涉到以下步驟中，The Transmitter/Receiver (pull model) propagation involves these steps, - 用戶端電腦上，會使用交易來產生將對應 「 傳播權杖 」 藉由呼叫 On the client machine, using the transaction generates a corresponding "propagation token" by calling - 傳送包含 「 傳播權杖 」 的交易到遠端電腦使用任何慣用的方法的資料。Send the data containing the "propagation token" of the transaction to the remote machine using any preferred method - 遠端電腦上，使用 「 傳播權杖 」 以取得用戶端交易的複製品，藉由呼叫 On the remote machine, use the "propagation token" to obtain a clone of the client transaction by calling 傳送者/接收者模型會提供更佳的效能，其中交易權杖會傳送到遠端電腦，但遠端機器可能無法使用它來取得交易案例中。The Transmitter/Receiver model provides better performance in scenarios where the transaction token is sent to a remote machine, but the remote machine may not use it to obtain the transaction. 這是因為交易不會傳播到呼叫。This is because the transaction is not propagated until is called. 另一個優點是，傳送到任何遠端機器上的傳播權杖時所提供之所在位置的電腦上才可用的匯出 cookie。Another advantage is that the propagation token can be sent to any remote machine, while the export cookie can be used only on the machine that provided the whereabouts. 不過，您也應注意之所在位置的遠端交易管理員封裝在所有的傳播權杖中，使其大於匯出/匯入模型中對應的交易 cookie。However, you should also note that the whereabouts of remote transaction managers are encapsulated in all the propagation tokens, making them bigger than the corresponding transaction cookies from the Export/Import model. **附註**會使用這個型別以防止呼叫來自不受信任的程式碼; 不過，只有立即呼叫端需要擁有`FullTrust`權限集合。**Note** This type uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

summary.span: 將異動物件轉換成匯出異動 Cookie。

span.span: Transforms a transaction object into an export transaction cookie.

returns.span: 表示指定之 物件的匯出交易 Cookie。

span.span: An export transaction cookie representing the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要匯出的交易，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method if you want to export a transaction. `transaction`傳遞以及封送處理為交易 cookie。The `transaction` that is passed along is marshaled into a transaction cookie. 您接著可以傳送至目的端處理序的異動 cookie。You can then send the transaction cookie to the destination process. 這被指做為處理程序或系統之間傳播交易。This is referred to as propagating the transaction between processes or systems. 傳播會被視為本機交易到目的地的推送位置推入模式。The propagation is considered to be a push model where the local transaction is pushed to the destination. 因此，資訊包含在`whereabouts`必須描述目的地異動管理員。Therefore, information contained in `whereabouts` must describe the destination transaction manager. 如需不同傳播模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 類別的＜備註＞一節。For more information on different propagation models, see the Remarks section of the class.

summary.span: 從指定的傳送者傳播權杖產生 執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法，連同方法，為 「 提取 」 傳播，以交易為 「 提取 」 從遠端電腦解封送處理交易呼叫此方法時提供的功能。This method, together with the method, provide functionality for "pull" propagation, in which the transaction is "pulled" from the remote machine when this method is called to unmarshal the transaction. 如需不同傳播模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 類別的＜備註＞一節。For more information on different propagation models, see the Remarks section of the class.

exception.span: 由於無法聯絡交易管理員，交易的還原序列化 (Deserialization) 失敗。

span.span: The deserialization of a transaction fails because the transaction manager cannot be contacted.

exception.span: 這可能由網路防火牆 (Firewall) 或安全性設定導致。

span.span: This may be caused by network firewall or security settings.

param.span: 要封送處理至傳播權杖中的交易。

span.span: A transaction to be marshaled into a propagation token.

summary.span: 針對指定的 產生傳送者傳播權杖。

span.span: Generates a propagation token for the specified .

returns.span: 這個方法會與 方法一起提供「傳送者/接收者」傳播的功能，當呼叫後者來解除封送處理交易時，會從遠端機器「提取」交易。

span.span: This method, together with the method, provide functionality for Transmitter/Receiver propagation, in which the transaction is "pulled" from the remote machine when the latter is called to unmarshal the transaction.

returns.span: 如需不同傳播模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。

span.span: For more information on different propagation models, see class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] GetWhereabouts() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWhereabouts () As Byte()

summary.span: 取得 使用之分散式交易管理員的所在資訊。

span.span: Gets the Whereabouts of the distributed transaction manager that uses.

returns.span: 使用之分散式交易管理員的所在資訊。

span.span: The Whereabouts of the distributed transaction manager that uses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之所在位置包含描述交易管理員位置的位址。The Whereabouts contains an address that describes the location of a transaction manager. 其可允許兩個交易管理員彼此通訊，藉此將交易從一個系統傳播至另一個系統。This permits two transaction managers to communicate with one another and thereby propagate a transaction from one system to the other. 這個方法所傳回的資訊可用來提供位置資訊推入模型交易傳播，使用方法。The information returned by this method can be used to provide location information for push model transaction propagation with the method. 如需不同傳播模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 類別的＜備註＞一節。For more information on different propagation models, see the Remarks section of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid PromoterTypeDtc
Public Shared ReadOnly PromoterTypeDtc As Guid

summary.span: 分散式異動處理器的類型。

span.span: The type of the distributed transaction processor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值會用於`Transaction.PromoterType`屬性，如果是，或將會升級為 MSDTC 交易及`Transaction.GetPromotedToken`方法會傳回的 MSDTC 交易傳播權杖`byte[]`結果。This value is used for the `Transaction.PromoterType` property if the transaction is or will be promoted to MSDTC and the `Transaction.GetPromotedToken` method will return an MSDTC transaction propagation token for the `byte[]` result.
